alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Oklahoma; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 10 at 1:48PM CDT until June 11 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Oklahoma... North Canadian River near Harrah affecting Lincoln, Oklahoma and Pottawatomie Counties.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. OKC081-109-125-110700- /O.NEW.KOUN.FL.Y.0025.220610T1848Z-220611T1200Z/ /HRHO2.N.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NO/ 148 PM CDT Fri Jun 10 2022 ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...North Canadian River near Harrah. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Shallow flooding of low-lying areas along the river may occur in eastern Oklahoma County... the southwest corner of Lincoln County... and northwestern Pottawatomie County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 10.6 feet. - Forecast...The North Canadian River is expected to rise to a crest of 11.5 feet this evening. - Action stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
